${modID}:AerPower.NAME: Card Discount
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce the cost of the next card you draw by #b
Reduce the cost of the next #b

${modID}:SeismicShellPower.NAME: Seismic Shell
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to #b

${modID}:ArsonArmorPower.NAME: Arson Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: After taking damage this turn, #yInfuse Ignis.
For #b%s turns, after taking damage, #yInfuse Ignis.

${modID}:BefuddlingBrewPower.NAME: Befuddling Brew
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn, apply #b%d #yWeak to ALL enemies.

${modID}:SneakySipPower.NAME: Sneaky Sip
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #yInfusion does not disable #yWithdrawal effects.
Your next #b%d #yInfusions do not disable #yWithdrawal effects.

${modID}:FlaskFracturePower.NAME: Flask Fracture
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #yInfusion this turn is cancelled.
Your next #b%d #yInfusions this turn is cancelled.

${modID}:FulminatingIgnisPower.NAME: Fulminating Ignis
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the effect of your next Ignis #yInfusion by #b%d.

${modID}:FulminatingTerraPower.NAME: Fulminating Terra
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the effect of your next Terra #yInfusion by #b%d.

${modID}:DelayedInsolubilityPower.NAME: Saturating
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn, your #yWithdrawal effects occur #b1 additional time.
Next turn, your #yWithdrawal effects occur #b%d additional times.

${modID}:InsolubilityPower.NAME: Saturated
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, your #yWithdrawal effects occur #b1 additional time.
This turn, your #yWithdrawal effects occur #b%d additional times.
